results.content: I last used HTML about 12 years ago. This course was a great re-introduction to the basic tags and setup. The introduction to Bootstrap was terrific. Glad I took the course.

results.content: This course was an excellent intro into HTML, I wish there was a bit more focus on more vocabulary/attributes within HTML but that's just me personally; I recognize that the course served it's purpose of getting me started admirably!
